verses.verse: וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> And they took their journey מֵֽאֵילִ֔ם <S%H362><s%> from Elim וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> and all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> unto the wilderness סִ֔ין <S%H5512><s%> of Sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> is between אֵילִ֖ם <S%H362><s%> which [is] between Elim וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> is between סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> and Sinai בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> teen יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> of the second לְצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> after their departing out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

[וַיִּלִּינוּ כ] (וַיִּלֹּ֜ונוּ <S%H3885><s%> abide ק) כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> And the whole congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> any יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> add מוּתֵ֤נוּ <S%H4191><s%> we had died בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּשִׁבְתֵּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> when we sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by סִ֣יר <S%H5518><s%> pots הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> by the flesh בְּאָכְלֵ֥נוּ <S%H398><s%> [and] when we did eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread לָשֹׂ֑בַע <S%H7648><s%> to the full כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הוֹצֵאתֶ֤ם <S%H3318><s%> for ye have brought us forth אֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּדְבָּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> into this wilderness הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְהָמִ֛ית <S%H4191><s%> to kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whole הַקָּהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> this whole assembly הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this בָּרָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> with hunger ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מַמְטִ֥יר <S%H4305><s%> Behold I will rain לָכֶ֛ם לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וְיָצָ֨א <S%H3318><s%> shall go out הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> for you and the people וְלָֽקְטוּ֙ <S%H3950><s%> and gather דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> a certain rate י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> A day's בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H3117><s%> day לְמַ֧עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of אֲנַסֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H5254><s%> that I may prove הֲיֵלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will walk בְּתוֹרָתִ֖י <S%H8451><s%> in my law אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> not

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> And it shall come to pass that on the sixth וְהֵכִ֖ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> they shall prepare אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> [that] which יָבִ֑יאוּ <S%H935><s%> they bring in וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִשְׁנֶ֔ה <S%H4932><s%> and it shall be twice עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> as אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> much יִלְקְט֖וּ <S%H3950><s%> as much as they gather י֥וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> daily יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> day ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֶ֕רֶב <S%H6153><s%> At even וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> then ye shall know כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD הוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> hath brought you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וּבֹ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> And in the morning וּרְאִיתֶם֙ <S%H7200><s%> then ye shall see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּשָׁמְע֥וֹ <S%H8085><s%> for that he heareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּלֻנֹּתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8519><s%> your murmurings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H5168><s%> and what [are] we מָ֔ה <S%H4100><s%> and what כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for [תַלֹּונוּ כ] (תַלִּ֖ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> abide ק) עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses בְּתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> shall give יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> [This shall be] when the LORD לָכֶ֨ם בָּעֶ֜רֶב <S%H6153><s%> you in the evening בָּשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh לֶאֱכֹ֗ל <S%H398><s%> to eat וְלֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> and in the morning לִשְׂבֹּ֔עַ <S%H7646><s%> to the full בִּשְׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> heareth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּלֻנֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8519><s%> your murmurings אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> are we מַלִּינִ֖ם <S%H8519><s%> your grumblings עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> against וְנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H5168><s%> we מָ֔ה <S%H4100><s%> and what לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not עָלֵ֥ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against תְלֻנֹּתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8519><s%> your grumblings כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> but עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [are] not against us but against the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַת֙ <S%H5712><s%> unto all the congregation בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel קִרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> Come near לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> for he hath heard אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> תְּלֻנֹּתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8519><s%> your murmurings

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כְּדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> And it came to pass as Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to the whole עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> unto the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּפְנ֖וּ <S%H6437><s%> that they looked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> toward the wilderness וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and behold the glory יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נִרְאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> appeared בֶּעָנָֽן׃ <S%H6051><s%> in the cloud פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּלוּנֹּת֮ <S%H8519><s%> the murmurings בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto them saying בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> At הָֽעַרְבַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H6153><s%> twilight תֹּאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> ye shall eat בָשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh וּבַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and in the morning תִּשְׂבְּעוּ־ <S%H7646><s%> ye shall be filled לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> with bread וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came בָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And it came to pass that at even וַתַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up הַשְּׂלָ֔ו <S%H7958><s%> the quails וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp וּבַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and in the morning הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came שִׁכְבַ֣ת <S%H7902><s%> lay הַטַּ֔ל <S%H2919><s%> the dew סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the host

וַתַּ֖עַל <S%H5927><s%> was gone up שִׁכְבַ֣ת <S%H7902><s%> that lay הַטָּ֑ל <S%H2919><s%> And when the dew וְהִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> behold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> behold upon the face הַמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness דַּ֣ק <S%H1851><s%> [there lay] a small מְחֻסְפָּ֔ס <S%H2636><s%> round thing דַּ֥ק <S%H1851><s%> [as] small כַּכְּפֹ֖ר <S%H3713><s%> as the hoar frost עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> on the ground

וַיִּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> [it] they said אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> to another מָ֣ן <S%H4478><s%> It [is] manna ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> for they wist מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> not what it [was] And Moses אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> It הַלֶּ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> unto them This [is] the bread אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לָכֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> you to eat

זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִקְט֣וּ <S%H3950><s%> Gather מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> of it אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of it every man לְפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> according אָכְל֑וֹ <S%H400><s%> to his eating עֹ֣מֶר <S%H6016><s%> an omer לַגֻּלְגֹּ֗לֶת <S%H1538><s%> for every man מִסְפַּר֙ <S%H4557><s%> [according to] the number נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> of your persons אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ye every man לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> those בְּאָהֳל֖וֹ <S%H168><s%> for [them] which [are] in his tents תִּקָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> take

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיִּלְקְט֔וּ <S%H3950><s%> so and gathered הַמַּרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> some more וְהַמַּמְעִֽיט׃ <S%H4591><s%> some less

וַיָּמֹ֣דּוּ <S%H4058><s%> And when they did mete בָעֹ֔מֶר <S%H6016><s%> [it] with an omer וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> had no הֶעְדִּיף֙ <S%H5736><s%> had nothing over הַמַּרְבֶּ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> he that gathered much וְהַמַּמְעִ֖יט <S%H4591><s%> and he that gathered little לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> had no הֶחְסִ֑יר <S%H2637><s%> had no lack אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְפִֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> according אָכְל֖וֹ <S%H400><s%> to his eating לָקָֽטוּ׃ <S%H3950><s%> they gathered

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Let no man אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יוֹתֵ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> leave מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> of it till the morning

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Notwithstanding they hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> not unto Moses וַיּוֹתִ֨רוּ <S%H3498><s%> of them left אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H582><s%> but some מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> of it עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> of it until the morning וַיָּ֥רֻם <S%H7311><s%> and it bred תּוֹלָעִ֖ים <S%H8438><s%> worms וַיִּבְאַ֑שׁ <S%H887><s%> and stank וַיִּקְצֹ֥ף <S%H7107><s%> was wroth עֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> and Moses

וַיִּלְקְט֤וּ <S%H3950><s%> And they gathered אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> it every morning בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man כְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> according אָכְל֑וֹ <S%H400><s%> to his eating וְחַ֥ם <S%H2552><s%> waxed hot הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> and when the sun וְנָמָֽס׃ <S%H4549><s%> it melted

וַיַּנִּ֤יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> And they laid it up אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> till the morning כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> bade מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> as Moses וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הִבְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H887><s%> and it did not stink וְרִמָּ֖ה <S%H7415><s%> neither was there any worm לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become בּֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commandeth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD מְלֹ֤א <S%H4393><s%> Fill הָעֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H6016><s%> an omer מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at לְמִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> of it to be kept לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1755><s%> for your generations לְמַ֣עַן ׀ <S%H4616><s%> because of יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> that they may see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלֶּ֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> i הֶאֱכַ֤לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> wherewith I have fed אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> you in the wilderness בְּהוֹצִיאִ֥י <S%H3318><s%> when I brought you forth אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt
